questions.question: Considering the overall layout and typography, what is the primary purpose of this visually presented information, as evidenced by prominent text and numerical data organization?

What is the visual texture of the text displayed across the entire nutrition facts panel, referencing its uniformity and readability?
What is the most frequently used visual element for separating and organizing different categories of nutritional information, based on its repeated appearance?

Based on the size and prominence of the displayed numbers, what is the most visually emphasized nutritional metric displayed?
What visual style is employed for the presentation of the nutrient values, focusing on the method used to denote individual units of measurement?
Describe the visual hierarchy of the different nutritional component categories, observing their placement and relative sizes within the layout.
